activities: Follett licenses software products to schools and libraries which assist with the management of student data, resources, digital content, and instruction.  In providing support to the schools and libraries Follett may have access to databases containing student information. Such support may include database conversion and troubleshooting.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Follett customer data is covered by the Safe Harbor Framework.  Follett customers are schools so the data will include student information. Follett does not plan to manually process any personal data.
recoursemech: For complaints that cannot be resolved between Follett and the complainant, Follett has agreed to participate in the dispute resolution procedures of the American Arbitration Association (AAA) pursuant to the Safe Harbor Principles.
